entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
